CustomField.description: Displays Reactivation Date if populated else First Reactivation Date else Response Date - Used by FCI funnels to set the MAE Date
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT (ISBLANK ( FCRM__FCR_Reactivation_Date__c )), FCRM__FCR_Reactivation_Date__c , IF (NOT (ISBLANK ( CFCR_First_Reactivation_Date__c )), CFCR_First_Reactivation_Date__c, FCRM__FCR_Response_Date__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays Reactivation Date if populated else First Reactivation Date else Response Date - Used by FCI funnels to set the MAE date
CustomField.label: Admin MAE Date
